name: Beer n Pee Dreams VR
description:
🎩🍻 In Beer n Pee Dreams VR, you're the "beer-o" of your own story—where hops meet both hopes and, well, the need to pee. Hop in, sip up, and get ready to a dream world that's as wacky as it is wet! 🎶🌙

Strap in for a pee-rific adventure:

  • 🌌🚽 Get lost in the dreams as you search for the relief station—a.k.a. the bathroom.
  • 🕯️🎸 Light up the night with lanterns in your virtual hands.
  • 🎶🌙 Leap through a moonlit scene so vibey, it's like Clair de Lune came to life.
  • 🎵🍺 And yes, you'll actually hear Clair de Lune and Gymnopédies as you make that "one small leap for man, but a giant sip for mankind."
  • 🎩🎶And to wrap it all up, our original main theme wears many hats—from rock'n roll rhythms to funky beats

Dive in and get ready to blur the lines between dreams and reality in the most epic, beer-fueled way possible! 🎵🍻
